articles.author: Sajeet Manghat
articles.title: Tata Steel Takes A Rs 12,560-Crore Investment Hit On European Operations - BQ Prime
articles.description: The write-off comes due to potential impact of the economic downturn in Europe and supply chain disruption caused by Ukraine war.
articles.content: As the company invests in cleaner production, on a consolidated basis, Tata Steel U.K. has recognised an impairment worth Rs 2,631 crore against its existing carbon-intensive, heavy-end assetsblast f… [+834 chars]
